channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Brandy Explains Abrupt Exit From Stage at Chicago Concert With Monica
item.description: When life gives you a stage slip-up, you just gotta keep it real like Brandy! 🎤💃 #OopsIDidItAgain

item.title: See Rilo Kiley Bring Out Waxahatchee for ‘With Arms Outstretched’ at L.A. Show
item.description: 🎶 @RiloKiley + @k_crutchfield = pure magic! Watch their epic collab of ‘With Arms Outstretched’ in L.A.! 🔥 #LiveMusic #CollaborationGoals

item.title: See Bruce Springsteen Perform ‘Streets of Philadelphia’ at Academy Museum Gala
item.description: 🎸🌟 Bruce Springsteen rocks the Academy Museum Gala with 'Streets of Philadelphia'! 🎤 Who else is feeling those classic vibes? #BruceSpringsteen #AcademyMuseum 🎶

item.title: Florence + The Machine Make “Everybody Scream” on The Graham Norton Show: Watch
item.description: Florence + The Machine bringing the magic to The Graham Norton Show! 🎶✨ Who else can't get enough of their electrifying performance? #MusicMondays

item.title: Sabrina Carpenter Reunites With Domingo In SNL Hosting Debut
item.description: Buckle up, cause your girl Sabrina Carpenter is taking over SNL! 🎉 Who's ready for some major talent and laughs? 💃 #SabrinaCarpenter #SNLDebut
